snippet: President Obama on Tuesday nominated Leslie R. Caldwell, a defense lawyer specializing in white-collar cases, to be assistant attorney general for the Justice Department’s criminal division.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates white-collar defense lawyer Leslie R Caldwell to be assistant attorney general for Justice Department's criminal division.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Tuesday nominated Leslie R. Caldwell, a defense lawyer specializing in white-collar cases, to be assistant attorney general for the Justice Department’s criminal division.

headline.main: New Chief Nominated for Justice Dept. Division
headline.print_headline: New Chief Nominated For Justice Dept. Division
